actors

Class Plant

  • java.lang.Object
    • actors.Plant
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnergyPlant

    public class Plant
extends java.lang.Object
    A plant that attacks any insect that is nearby. As it levels up, damage and range increase
    Author:
    Dhruv Masurekar
